text:
@GavinNewsom #COVID19 deaths are ASSUMED, NOT LAB VERIFIED.

This shutdown IS:
#ANTISCIENTIFIC

#StormyDaniels FAILED

#UkraineQuidProQuo FAILED
#Impeachment FAILED

THIS ORGANIZED ECONIMIC SEIGE IS HOLDING AMERICANS HOSTAGE.
